Curator's comments: This scarab was not seen. The number JE39124 was given to six different scarabs from Naukratis. The Egyptian Museum in Cairo provided only photographs for JE39124.1 and JE39124.2, both carved from steatite. It is possible that all six were made out of the same material.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (OG.05) (phase 3)
Previous owner: Currently owned by: Egyptian Museum, Cairo
